import math
t=int(raw_input())
for i in range(0,t):
    k=raw_input().split()
    for l in range(0,11):
        k[l]=int(k[l])
    c=0
    c2=0
    k=sorted(k,reverse=True)
    m=int(raw_input())
    for j in range(0,11):
        if j<=m-1:
         if k[j]==k[m-1]:
             c=c+1
        else:
            if k[j]==k[m-1]:
                c2=c2+1


    k1=math.factorial(c+c2)/(math.factorial(c)*math.factorial(c2))
    print k1
